QuestData.Title: Thieving Little Pluckers
QuestData.Description: I don't have the most glamorous job in the world.$B$BI do not concern myself with matters of war or the deep mysteries of the halls of Uldum or what have you.$B$BI am in charge of these grounds... and these grounds grow dates.$B$BNow, these little date-plucking mongrels have gotten gutsy enough to stand on each other's shoulders to try and steal my precious fruit.$B$BI will not stand for this.$B$BTake this mallet, crafted by the titans, blessed by the sun-kings and who-knows-what-else and smash the runts!
QuestData.LogDescription: Smash 30 Sand Pygmies with the Tahret Dynasty Mallet.
QuestData.RewardText: You showed those thieving little scoundrels! Great job.
